## trim variable

Higher order trim function (both sides) with support for user defined trimmable characters (default: whitespace only).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
trim: (x: string) => Stringer<string>
```

## Example


```ts
trim()("  Hello   ")
// "Hello"

trim(" -+")("-+-+- Hello -+-+-")
// "Hello"

```
